Ancestry-Dragonblood -- Female Dragonblood Human Fighter
Strength: +1 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +1 Intelligence: +3 Wisdom: +1 Charisma: +1
Background: Criminal Deity: Nethys
Experience: 435/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Dragon's Flight: (1) Can Fly 20' once per rd
True Dragon's Flight: Has a 20' fly Speed
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry; Class Selectable Feature Count: Dragonblood (Draconic Exemplar); Fighter (Key Attribute); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Arcane Dragonblood; Breath Of The Dragon; Deadly Aspect; Divine Dragonblood; Draconic Aspect (Claw); Draconic Aspect (Jaws); Draconic Aspect (Tail); Draconic Resistance; Draconic Scent; Draconic Sight; Draconic Veil; Dragon Lore; Dragon's Flight; Form Of The Dragon; Formidable Breath; Lingering Breath; Majestic Presence; Occult Dragonblood; Primal Dragonblood; Scaly Hide; Traditional Resistances; True Dragon's Flight; Vicious Swing; Wing Buffet Dragonblood Features: Adamantine Exemplar; Draconic Exemplar; Dragonblood Heritage Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Strength); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block; Strength Criminal Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Dexterity, Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Experienced Smuggler; Skill Trained (Stealth; Underworld Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Arcane Dragonblood: Has the Arcane Sense feature
Draconic Exemplar: 1 selection
Draconic Sight: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Dragon Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Dragon Lore) feature
Fighter Feats: Class Feats (Choose 1 from any)
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Occult Dragonblood: Has the Oddity Identification feature
Dragonblood Heritage: Has the dragonblood trait and can take dragonblood ancestry feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +6 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Dragon Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Ratfolk Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +6 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +4 (charisma; trained) Religion: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; trained) Legal Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Society: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Butchering Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +5 (dexterity; trained)
Crafting: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Nature: +4 (wisdom; trained) Survival: +1 (wisdom; untrained)

Skill Notes:

Arcane Dragonblood: Skill Trained (Arcana)

Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Occult Dragonblood: Skill Trained (Occultism)
Primal Dragonblood: Skill Trained (Nature)
Draconic Scent: Has 30' imprecise scent
Experienced Smuggler: Automatically gets at least 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Primal Dragonblood: Can use Nature to Sense Direction and Subsist in the wilds
Combat
Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 17 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 14 (strength; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Adze (+6 1d10+1 S; strength; expert); Claws (+7 1d4+1 S [Crit +d8]; dexterity; expert); Hand Crossbow (+7 1d6 P R60'; dexterity; expert); Jaws (+6 1d6+1 P [Crit +d8]; strength; expert); Mace (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert); Tail (+6 1d6+1 B [Crit +d8]; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Deadly Aspect: Draconic Aspect attack has the deadly d8 trait
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Draconic Aspect (Claw): Claws inflict 1d4 HP slashing
Draconic Aspect (Jaws): Jaws inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Draconic Aspect (Tail): Tail inflicts 1d6 HP bludgeoning
Formidable Breath: Has increased Breath Of The Dragon effects
Scaly Hide: +2 Armor Class in no armor
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Breath Of The Dragon: (2) Breath inflicts 1d6 HP bludgeoning (save basic Reflex) in a 30' cone or 60' line once every 1d4 rd
Divine Dragonblood: +1 initiative
Lingering Breath: Breath Of The Dragon inflicts difficult terrain for 1 min, and targets that critically fail their saves suffer +2d6 HP persistent damage
Majestic Presence: (1) 20' emanation inflicts frightened 2 once per creature per day (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates, critical failure inflicts frightened 4)
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Vicious Swing: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 1 extra damage die and counts as 2 Strikes for the multiple attack penalty
Wing Buffet: (2) Successful Athletics vs. Fortitude inflicts on 2 adjacent targets 1 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push, 2 HP and a 10' push on a critical success, or 0 HP only on a failure; critical failure inflicts prone on self
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Draconic Resistance: Has resistance 1 to a choice of acid, cold, fire, electricity, or sonic, or resistance 1 if the source is a dragon
Dragonblood Heritage: Successes on saves vs. fear are critical successes
Traditional Resistances: +1 Armor Class and saves vs. primal magical effects, or +2 vs. primal sleep and paralysis
Magic
Attack: Arcane Innate: +4 (charisma; trained); Divine Innate: +4 (charisma; trained); Occult Innate: +4 (charisma; trained); Primal Innate: +4 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 14 (charisma; trained); Divine Innate: 14 (charisma; trained); Occult Innate: 14 (charisma; trained); Primal Innate: 14 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Detect Magic (AC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Dragon Form (A6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 22, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Dragon Form (D6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 22, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Dragon Form (O6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 22, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Dragon Form (P6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 22, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Humanoid Form (A2): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Humanoid Form (D2): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Humanoid Form (O2): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Humanoid Form (P2): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Magic Notes:
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st rank at will
Draconic Veil (Arcane): Knows the Humanoid Form arcane innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day, lasting 1 hr
Draconic Veil (Divine): Knows the Humanoid Form divine innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day, lasting 1 hr
Draconic Veil (Occult): Knows the Humanoid Form occult innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day, lasting 1 hr
Draconic Veil (Primal): Knows the Humanoid Form primal innate spell; can cast it at 5th rank once per day, lasting 1 hr
Form Of The Dragon (Arcane): Knows the Dragon Form arcane innate spell; can cast it at 8th rank once per day
Form Of The Dragon (Divine): Knows the Dragon Form divine innate spell; can cast it at 8th rank once per day
Form Of The Dragon (Occult): Knows the Dragon Form occult innate spell; can cast it at 8th rank once per day
Form Of The Dragon (Primal): Knows the Dragon Form primal innate spell; can cast it at 8th rank once per day
Notes
Validation Errors:
Ancestry Feats Allocation: 1 available vs. 23 allocated
Deadly Aspect Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and draconic aspect feature (currently 1)
Draconic Scent Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Draconic Veil Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13
Dragon's Flight Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5
Form Of The Dragon Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 17
Formidable Breath Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and breath of the dragon feature (currently 1)
Lingering Breath Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 17 and breath of the dragon feature (currently 1)
Majestic Presence Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13
Traditional Resistances Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and arcane dragonblood feature (currently 1), divine dragonblood feature (currently 1), occult dragonblood feature (currently 1) or primal dragonblood feature (currently 1)
True Dragon's Flight Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and dragon's flight feature (currently 1)
Wing Buffet Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9 and athletics rank (currently 1) >= 2
